data.title: Organisation
data.description: The list of ACM MMAsia 2021 key organisers has been released.

data.title: Sponsorship
data.description: The Organising Committee for the 2021 ACM Multimedia Asia warmly invites you to become a sponsor of the conference to be held at Gold Coast, Australia on December 1st to 3rd 2021.

data.title: How to access Gather.Town
data.description: A tutorial for attending the conference on Gather.Town is available.

data.title: PhD School
data.description: A live in-person PhD School with an online-broadcasting component will be enabled on Day 3.
